麁字的基本解释

麁
cū
同“粗”。

麁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cū］
［《廣韻》倉胡切，平模，清。］
亦作“蔍1”。亦作“麁1”。亦作“麄1”。
(1)行超远。
(2)泛指出行。
(3)粗糙；粗劣。
(4)粗疏；粗浅。
(5)大。粗强。
(6)大。粗大；粗厚。
(7)粗豪，豪壮。
(8)粗鲁，粗野。
(9)粗鄙；粗贱。
(10)粗略，大略。
(11)粗布。
(12)糙米；粗粮。
(13)草鞋、麻鞋之类。

麁字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹿字部】　麁； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1509第01
【廣韻】倉胡切，音麤。疎也，大也，物不精也。【正字通】俗麤字。

麁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
麁字的起名意思

暂无。

麁
Basic explanation of words
麁
cū
Same as "rough".
麁
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cū］
["Guangyun" Canghu cut, flat model, Qing. ]
Also known as "蔍1". Also known as "麁1". Also known as "麄1".
(1) Travel far away.
(2) In general, point out the line.
(3) Rough; crude.
(4) Coarse; rough and shallow.
(5) Big. Rough and strong.
(6) Big. Thick; thick.
(7) Rough and bold.
(8) Rude and rude.
(9) Crudeness; crudeness.
(10) Rough, rough.
(11) Coarse cloth.
(12) Brown rice; coarse grains.
(13) Straw shoes, hemp shoes and the like.
麁
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Jixia] [Deer Department] 　麁; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1509 No. 01
[Guangyun] Canghu cut, thick sound. Nine, big, not good. 【Zhengzitong】vulgar and thick characters.
麁
